channel.title: Spaces free for Scum and Villainy Star Wars Day (May the 4th be with you)
channel.description:
I've had a player drop out of my 2nd and 3rd session of Scum and Villainy for Star Wars Day tomorrow.
[date=2019-05-04 time=15:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] → [date=2019-05-04 time=18:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbT918CL_DyZIlq50Kb
